mapper.insert: insert into exercise_session (exercise_session_id, name, exercise_id, card_id, session_type, time, reps, sets, intensity, tempo, rest) values (#{exerciseSessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exerciseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sessionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sets,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rest,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update exercise_session set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exercise_id = #{exerciseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, session_type = #{sessionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reps = #{reps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sets = #{sets,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intensity = #{intensity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tempo = #{tempo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rest = #{rest,jdbcType=INTEGER} where exercise_session_id = #{exerciseSessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select exercise_session_id, name, exercise_id, card_id, session_type, time, reps, sets, intensity, tempo, rest from exercise_session where exercise_session_id = #{exerciseSessionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
